content.raw:
Nice work. Can you make it so that when switching between translate and rotate modes, the model manipulator stays attached and visible?

For example:

1. click translate button

2. click object, e.g. a box -> model manipulator appears

3. click rotate button -> model manipulator changes to rotate mode but stays visible and attached to box.

4. click arrow button -> model manipulator disappears.
